comment: Do not take this professor. She was extremely difficult and does not seem to care about students success at all. Its almost as if she wants her students to fail. She is very hard to work with.
There is a language barrier. Very hard to understand.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Svetlana does have an accent that made her a little hard to understand, especially if you did not read any of the assignments before class. She was very helpful if you had questions and responded very quickly. Tests was very hard - there was multi choice and short answer.

She explains course requirements to students clearly and is very helpful.  Her labs are tough and very long but you will learn from them. I believe she is one of the best instructors in the graduate program because her expectations of students are what employers expect.
An excellent professor ... one of the very best!!!!  If you do not work hard, you will not do well.

She asks for surveys after an assignment is submitted to see what to change, she asks you to send messages anonymously to her so that if she can change anything, she would. She doesn't listen to her students. She does NO HANDS-ON. She is a horrible teacher that does not take pride in teaching and for this..she is a very hard teacher to work with.

She's an ok teacher. You will learn alot from her class if you study. However, I didn't enjoy the labs because they took forever to complete. She also has an attitude at times when you ask a question. Her test are HARD so make sure you study your quizzes and notes. I give her a 3/5

Great professor.  I had her for multiple classes.  If you do the core work and try to elaborate with some sort of creative input and you'll succeed.  Heavily qualified with education, certification and experience.  If you want to sleep through class and still get an A, avoid her courses. If you want to learn a lot in a very interesting way, take it

I've taken 2 of her classes and am taking one this semester.....always a pain taking her class. She's really knowledgeable but her work load is way too much. Her lab instruction is confusing. And make sure you study at least 3 times before taking her exams.
A very good teacher. She loves what she teaches. Lots of hands-on activities. She responses promptly to emails and want you to learn the subject. She tests are short essay, so you must read the book.

This class is boring. The only reason I go to class is attendance's point which is 10% of your grade. Her accent is just so annoying. You won't understand anything that she said. You can just study by yourself instead of attending her class. However, exams are easy. Assignments are from the book. Labs are rediculous.

I havent learned anything from her data comm. class. She uses ppt which is very boring, homeworks comes from book. There are labs, which are useless. If you have another option, just take another class. Test's questions come from sample tests provided by textbook.
